    • Method Detail

      • getAlacarteMenu

        public java.util.ArrayList<AlacarteMenu> getAlacarteMenu()
        Method to get the AlacarteMenu

      • getPromotionalPackage

        public java.util.ArrayList<PromotionalPackage> getPromotionalPackage()
        Method to get the Promotional Package Menu

      • viewMenu

        public void viewMenu()
        The method to view both the Promotional Menu as well as the Alacarte Menu. It'll check if there is an existing byte file, if there is it will print the contents if not it will print an empty table. It is sorted according to their Different Types of Food : Appetizers : Drink : Main : Sides.

      • viewPromoPackage

        public void viewPromoPackage()
        Method to view Promotional Packages only from the byte stream.

      • addAlaCarteMenu

        public void addAlaCarteMenu()
        Method to Add AlaCarteMenu into the byte file. Let User Enter the Menu ID Let the User enter the MenuType : 1, 2, 3, 4, Appetizers, Main, Sides, Drinks respectively. .

      • deleteMenuItem

        public void deleteMenuItem()
        Method to Delete The Menu Item

      • editMenuItem

        public void editMenuItem()
        Method to Edit The Menu Item Allowing the User to edit which column of the given MENU ID that they would want to edit. Changing of Menu ID is not allowed.

      • addPromotionalPackage

        public void addPromotionalPackage()
        Method to add PromotionalPackage By default, the promotional packages are 20 percent off total bill. Loop a scanner to allow the user to add whichever menu item that they want into the promotional package. Press -1 to terminate.

      • deletePromo

        public void deletePromo()
        Method to Delete The Promotional Package Items through the Package ID.

      • editPromotionMenu

        public void editPromotionMenu()
        Method to Edit The Promotional Item Allows only to add or delete an item from the promotional packages, one at a time.
